title: The energy scaling behavior of a class of incompatible two-well problems
comment: 61 pages, 3 figures, comments welcome. Keywords: elasticity, microstructure, incompatible, two-well problems, scaling laws
summary: In this article, we study scaling laws for singularly perturbed two-well energies with prescribed Dirichlet boundary data in settings where the wells and/or the boundary data are incompatible. Our main focus is the geometrically linear two-well problem, for which we characterize the energy scaling in two dimensions for nearly all combinations of linear boundary data and stress-free strains. In particular, we prove that if the boundary data enforces oscillations and the weight $ε$ of the surface energy is small, the minimal energy upon subtracting the zeroth-order contribution scales either as $ε^{{4}/{5}}$ or as $ε^{{2}/{3}}$, depending on whether the wells differ by a rank-one or a rank-two matrix, respectively. For the gradient and divergence-free two-well problem, we obtain analogous results, showing an $ε^{{2}/{3}}$-scaling behavior in two dimensions whenever oscillations are energetically favored. These results follow by deriving matching upper and lower scaling bounds. The lower scaling bounds are established in a general $\mathcal{A}$-free framework for incompatible two-well problems, which allows us to compute the excess energy and characterize boundary data which enforce oscillations. The upper scaling bounds are obtained by branching constructions which are adapted to the incompatible setting.

title: Robust series linearization of nonlinear advection-diffusion equations
summary: We consider nonlinear partial differential equations (PDEs) for advection-diffusion processes which are augmented by an auxiliary parameter $δ$ such that $δ=0$ corresponds to linear advection-diffusion. We derive potentially non-perturbative series expansions in $δ$ that provide a process to obtain the solution of the nonlinear PDE through solving a hierarchical system of linear, forced PDEs with the forcing terms dependent on solutions at lower orders in the hierarchy. We rigorously detail our approach for a particular deformation that interpolates between linear advection-diffusion and the canonical Burgers' equation modeling nonlinear advection. In this case, we prove that the series has infinite radius of convergence for arbitrary integrable initial data, analyze the cases of a Dirac-delta initial condition (IC) (i.e., the fundamental solution) in an infinite domain and arbitrary IC in a periodic domain, and demonstrate the approach to turbulent behavior in a scenario with periodic forcing. We then treat models of nonlinear diffusion involving the $p$-Laplacian operator, including generalizations of the Poisson equation in $1$ and $2$ dimensions, and the heat equation in $1+1$ dimensions. We detail series expansions for two different deformations of these equations about their linear (ordinary Laplacian) counterparts, providing numerical evidence for the convergence of the series outside of a perturbative regime and demonstrating that the rate and radius of convergence are affected by choice of deformation. Our results provide a rigorous foundation for using series expansion techniques to study nonlinear advection-diffusion PDEs, opening new pathways for analysis and potential applications for quantum-assisted computational fluid dynamics.

title: Local Well-Posedness of the Motion of Inviscid Liquid Crystals with a Free Surface Boundary
summary: In this article, we prove the local well-posedness of the free-boundary Lin-Liu equations describing the motion of inviscid nematic liquid crystals in the presence of surface tension in Lagrangian coordinates. It is well known that a priori energy estimates alone are insufficient for establishing local existence in free-boundary problems involving inviscid fluid equations, primarily due to the loss of symmetry in the linearized equations. The main challenge is to develop an effective approximate system of equations that is asymptotically consistent with the free-boundary Lin-Liu model expressed in the Lagrangian coordinates. This system must accurately capture the coupling between the fluid motion and the harmonic heat flows within the interior, as well as the regularity of the moving boundary.

title: Taylor polynomials on left-quotients of Carnot groups
summary: We prove classical Taylor polynomial theorems for sub-Riemannian manifolds that are obtained as the submetric image of a Carnot group. For these theorems we also prove a sufficient condition for real analyticity and a result on L-harmonicity of Taylor polynomials.

title: From cohesive to brittle debonding: the quasistatic framework
summary: The approximation of brittle laws via steeper and steeper cohesive profiles is validated within the mechanical setting of debonding models, which describe the detachment process of a peeled elastic adhesive membrane. In a quasistatic framework, energetic solutions to a suitably rescaled cohesive debonding problem, formulated in terms of displacements, are proved to converge to a limit evolution of shapes solving its brittle counterpart. The proposed approach relies on an equivalent and recently introduced free-boundary reformulation of this latter model.

title: Lower Bound of Nodal Sets in Elliptic Homogenization and Functions with Strong Maximum Principle
summary: In this note, we first try to prove a uniform lower bound of nodal volume in elliptic homogenization setting. This lower bound is far from optimal. But, we can prove a constant lower bound in dimension two. Motivated by the proof, we extend this results to more general settings. To be more specific, we prove that the nodal volume has a constant lower bound for all continuous functions with strong maximum princple. Our result works for general functions beyond solutions to elliptic PDEs.

title: Nontrivial solutions for nonlinear problems driven by a superposition of fractional p-Laplacians with Neumann boundary conditions
summary: In this paper, we investigate existence results for nonlinear nonlocal problems governed by an operator obtained as a superposition of fractional $p$-Laplacians, subject to Neumann boundary conditions. A spectral analysis of the main operator leads us to apply different variational tools to establish our results. Specifically, we will use either the mountain pass method or the technique of linking over cones. Due to the generality of the setting, the resulting theory applies to a wide range of specific situations.

title: A third-order conservation law for the Kirchhoff-Pokhozhaev equation
summary: We prove that the special Kirchhoff equation studied by Pokhozhaev admits a third-order conservation law. We further show that if the energy of the solution is sufficiently small, then the $L^2$-norms of the derivatives up to third order of the solution remain uniformly bounded with respect to time.

title: Existence and stability for traveling waves of fourth order semilinear wave and Schrodinger equations
summary: We investigate the existence and spectral stability of traveling wave solutions for a class of fourth-order semilinear wave equations, commonly referred to as beam equations. Using variational methods based on a constrained maximization problem, we establish the existence of smooth, exponentially decaying traveling wave profiles for wavespeeds in the interval $(0, \sqrt{2})$. We derive precise spectral properties of the associated linearized operators and prove a Vakhitov-Kolokolov (VK) type stability criterion that completely characterizes spectral stability. Furthermore, we determine the sharp exponential decay rate of the traveling waves and demonstrate that it matches the decay rate of the Green's function for the linearized operator. Our analysis extends to fourth-order nonlinear Schrodinger equations, for which we establish analogous existence and stability results. The theoretical findings are complemented by numerical computations that verify the stability predictions and reveal the transition from unstable to stable regimes as the wavespeed varies. These results provide a comprehensive mathematical framework for understanding wave propagation phenomena in structural mechanics, particularly suspension bridge models.

title: Lifespan of the Non-resistive Hall-MHD System with Small Magnetic Gradient
summary: In this paper, we consider the non-resistive axially symmetric Hall-MHD system. We show that the lifespan of their strong solutions can be arbitrarily large if their initial magnetic gradient are small enough. Precise lifespan lower bounds for both viscid and inviscid cases are given.

title: Adiabatic approximation of Abelian Higgs models
summary: We construct novel solutions in $d\ge 3$ space dimensions of a family of nonlinear evolutions equations that includes the critical hyperbolic Abelian Higgs model (AHM). For the AHM, these solutions exhibit an ensemble of $N\ge 1$ slowly-moving, nearly parallel vortex filaments, whose leading-order dynamics are described by a wave map from ${\mathbb R}^{d-2}$ into the Abelian Higgs moduli space, a manifold carrying a natural Riemannian structure that parametrizes stationary 2d solutions of the AHM. We also prove extremely similar results that relate the critical Abelian Higgs heat flow, modeling certain superconductors, to the harmonic map heat flow into the Moduli space, as well as some parallel results for near-critical equations. When $d=3$, these results allow for the study of the poorly-understood phenomenon of vortex reconnection in this setting.

title: Steady Solutions to the Relativistic Boltzmann Equation in a Slab
summary:
We study steady solutions to the relativistic Boltzmann equation with hard-sphere interactions in a slab geometry. Under a spatial symmetry assumption in the transverse variables $x_2$ and $x_3$, the problem reduces to a one-dimensional spatial slab $x_1 \in [0,1]$ while retaining full three-dimensional momentum dependence. For non-negative inflow boundary conditions prescribed at $x_1=0$ and $x_1=1$, we prove the existence and uniqueness of a stationary solution in a weighted $L^1_p L^\infty_{x_1}$ framework, together with exponential decay in momentum.
  Our analysis treats the full slab domain and does not rely on any smallness assumption on the slab width. We establish sharp coercivity and continuity estimates for the collision frequency, together with weighted convolution and pointwise bounds for the nonlinear gain term. These estimates generate and propagate a $(-Δ_p)^{-1}$-type regularity within the solution framework, which plays a crucial role in the existence and uniqueness argument. In addition, we obtain uniform weighted integrability of the solution over arbitrary two-dimensional hyperplanes through the origin. This hyperplane estimate is derived as a genuinely a posteriori regularity property, without imposing any a priori hyperplane bounds, and follows from a Lorentz-invariant geometric reduction.

title: Global controllability of the Cahn-Hilliard equation
summary: This paper deals with the global control properties of the Cahn-Hilliard equation posed on the $d$-dimensional flat torus $\mathbb{T}^d$. We first prove that the system is small-time globally approximately controllable using a control supported on finitely many Fourier modes, following an approach based on geometric control theory techniques. Next, we show that the corresponding linearized problem is null-controllable with a localized control, where the control region is an arbitrary measurable set of positive Lebesgue measure. Our analysis is based on quantitative propagation of smallness estimates for the free solution. Furthermore, when $d\in \{1,2,3\},$ we ensure the local null controllability for the nonlinear system via a fixed-point argument. Finally, by combining these two results, we establish the global null controllability of the Cahn-Hilliard equation. In the first phase, the control is localized in Fourier modes, whereas in the second phase, it is spatially localized on a set of positive Lebesgue measure.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了d维平坦环面上Cahn-Hilliard方程的全局控制性质，证明了该系统的全局近似可控性、线性化问题的零可控性，并在低维情况下建立了非线性系统的全局零可控性。
AI.motivation: 研究Cahn-Hilliard方程在d维平坦环面上的全局控制性质，探索通过有限傅里叶模式控制和空间局部化控制来实现系统的可控性。
AI.method: 采用几何控制理论技术证明小时间全局近似可控性；基于自由解的小性传播定量估计证明线性化问题的零可控性；在低维情况下使用不动点论证建立非线性系统的局部零可控性；结合两种控制策略实现全局零可控性。
AI.result: 证明了Cahn-Hilliard方程在d维平坦环面上具有小时间全局近似可控性；线性化问题在任意正测度可测集上的局部化控制下是零可控的；当d∈{1,2,3}时，非线性系统具有局部零可控性；最终建立了该方程的全局零可控性。
AI.conclusion: Cahn-Hilliard方程在d维平坦环面上具有全局零可控性，第一阶段使用傅里叶模式局部化控制，第二阶段使用空间局部化控制，这一结果为偏微分方程的控制理论提供了重要进展。

title: Parabolic Equations with Singular Coefficients and Boundary Data: Analysis and Numerical Simulations
summary: We investigate linear parabolic equations in divergence form with singular coefficients and non-smooth boundary data. When the diffusion, drift, or potential terms, as well as the initial or boundary conditions, are distributions rather than functions, classical and weak solution concepts become inadequate due to the ill-posedness of products involving distributions. To overcome this, we introduce a framework of very weak solutions based on regularization techniques and the theory of moderate nets. Existence of very weak solutions is established under minimal regularity assumptions. We further prove consistency with classical solutions when the data are smooth and demonstrate uniqueness via negligibility arguments. Finally, we present numerical computations that illustrate the robustness of the very weak solution framework in handling highly singular inputs, including delta-type potentials and distributional boundary traces.

AI.tldr: 提出处理奇异系数和非光滑边界数据的抛物型方程的"非常弱解"框架，基于正则化技术和适度网理论，在分布数据下建立解的存在性、一致性和唯一性。
AI.motivation: 当扩散、漂移或势能项以及初始或边界条件是分布而非函数时，经典和弱解概念因涉及分布的乘积不适定而失效，需要新的解概念来处理奇异系数和非光滑边界数据。
AI.method: 引入基于正则化技术和适度网理论的"非常弱解"框架，通过正则化处理奇异数据，建立解的存在性，证明与经典解的一致性，并通过可忽略性论证证明唯一性。
AI.result: 在最小正则性假设下建立了非常弱解的存在性，证明了当数据光滑时与经典解的一致性，通过可忽略性论证证明了唯一性，并通过数值计算展示了框架处理高度奇异输入（包括δ型势能和分布边界迹）的鲁棒性。
AI.conclusion: 非常弱解框架为处理具有奇异系数和非光滑边界数据的线性抛物型方程提供了有效的数学工具，能够处理分布数据并保持解的适定性，数值实验验证了该框架在实际计算中的可行性。

title: Estimates for the wave equation on $β$-dimensional spaces of measures
summary: In this paper, we establish Miyachi-Peral-type fixed-time estimates for wave multipliers acting on $β$-dimension stable spaces of measures. Our estimates give a refinement of known estimates for the Hardy space. From these bounds, we deduce corresponding estimates for the wave equation with measure data.

AI.tldr: 该论文建立了波乘子在β维稳定测度空间上的Miyachi-Peral型固定时间估计，改进了Hardy空间的已知估计，并推导了测度数据波方程的相应估计。
AI.motivation: 研究波乘子在β维稳定测度空间上的行为，改进Hardy空间的现有估计，为测度数据波方程提供更精确的估计工具。
AI.method: 建立Miyachi-Peral型固定时间估计，针对波乘子在β维稳定测度空间上的作用，通过数学分析技术推导估计结果。
AI.result: 获得了波乘子在β维稳定测度空间上的精化估计，这些估计改进了Hardy空间的已知结果，并成功应用于测度数据波方程。
AI.conclusion: 论文建立了波乘子在β维稳定测度空间上的Miyachi-Peral型固定时间估计，为相关偏微分方程理论提供了新的分析工具和更精确的估计方法。

title: Existence and nonexistence results for a nonlocal isoperimetric problem on $\mathbb{H}^n$
summary: In Euclidean space $\mathbb{R}^n$, the minimization problem of a nonlocal isoperimetric functional with a competition between perimeter and a nonlocal term derived from the negative power of the distance function, has been extensively studied. In this paper, we investigate this nonlocal isoperimetric problem in hyperbolic space $\mathbb{H}^n$, we prove that the geodesic balls are unique minimizers (up to hyperbolic isometries) for small volumes $m$ and obtain nonexistence results for large volumes $m$ under certain ranges of the exponent in the nonlocal term.

AI.tldr: 研究双曲空间中非局部等周问题，证明小体积时测地球是唯一极小化子，大体积时在某些指数范围内不存在极小化子
AI.motivation: 欧几里得空间中关于周长与距离函数负幂次非局部项竞争的非局部等周泛函极小化问题已有广泛研究，本文旨在将此类问题推广到双曲空间中进行研究
AI.method: 在双曲空间$\mathbb{H}^n$中研究非局部等周问题，分析周长项与非局部项（距离函数的负幂次）竞争下的极小化问题
AI.result: 证明对于小体积$m$，测地球（在双曲等距变换下）是唯一的极小化子；对于大体积$m$，在非局部项指数的特定范围内获得不存在性结果
AI.conclusion: 双曲空间中的非局部等周问题与欧几里得空间有显著差异，小体积时测地球是唯一最优形状，但大体积时在某些参数条件下不存在极小化子

title: Uniformity of Maximal Hypoellipticity on Graded Lie Groups: From Pointwise to Global
summary: On graded Lie groups, we develop a mechanism that transfers the uniformity of maximal hypoellipcity from the frozen coefficients principal part of a differential operator to the full operator. Our approach brings the century-old "freeze-unfreeze" strategy into the hypoelliptic setting, and offers a transparent and flexible framework for lifting symbol-level hypoelliptic properties to global elliptic estimates, without relying on pseudodifferential calculus. In addition, we prove that symmetric operators of hypoelliptic type on a graded Lie group are self-adjoint.

AI.tldr: 在分级李群上，建立了一种机制将微分算子的冻结系数主部的极大次椭圆性均匀性传递到完整算子，将百年"冻结-解冻"策略引入次椭圆背景，提供透明框架将符号层级的次椭圆性质提升为全局椭圆估计。
AI.motivation: 传统方法依赖伪微分算子理论，本文旨在为分级李群上的微分算子建立更透明、灵活的框架，直接从符号层级的次椭圆性质推导全局椭圆估计，同时研究对称次椭圆型算子的自伴性。
AI.method: 采用"冻结-解冻"策略，将微分算子的系数在局部冻结，利用冻结算子的极大次椭圆性，通过均匀性机制将这一性质传递到完整算子，不依赖伪微分算子理论。
AI.result: 成功建立了从冻结系数主部到完整算子的极大次椭圆性传递机制，证明了分级李群上对称次椭圆型算子的自伴性，提供了不依赖伪微分算子的椭圆估计框架。
AI.conclusion: 本文为分级李群上的微分算子理论提供了创新方法，将经典冻结策略扩展到次椭圆背景，建立了符号层级性质与全局估计的直接联系，并解决了对称次椭圆算子的自伴性问题。

title: Sharp Time Estimates for Some Nonlocal Evolution Equations
summary: In this paper, we consider the Cauchy problem for the nonlocal evolution equation \(u_t = d(J*u) - u\) in \(\R\). We present a new method to prove that \(e^{(d-1)t}\) is the sharp time bound.

AI.tldr: 本文提出新方法证明非局部演化方程Cauchy问题中e^{(d-1)t}是尖锐时间界
AI.motivation: 研究非局部演化方程u_t = d(J*u) - u在实数域上的Cauchy问题，需要确定解的精确时间增长界
AI.method: 提出新方法证明e^{(d-1)t}是尖锐时间界，具体方法未在摘要中详细说明
AI.result: 成功证明e^{(d-1)t}是该方程Cauchy问题的尖锐时间界
AI.conclusion: 新方法有效证明了非局部演化方程的时间增长界，为相关研究提供了理论工具

title: Hyperbolic equations with fifth-order symmetries
summary: This paper examines the classification of hyperbolic equations. We study a class of equations of the form $$\frac{\partial^2 u}{\partial x\partial y}=F\left(\frac{\partial u}{\partial x},\frac{\partial u}{\partial y},u\right),$$ where $u(x,y)$ is the unknown function and $x,y$ are independent variables. The classification is based on the requirement for the existence of higher fifth-order symmetries. As a result, a list of four equations with the required conditions was obtained.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究一类双曲型偏微分方程的分类问题，基于方程存在五阶及以上对称性的要求，最终得到了四个满足条件的方程。
AI.motivation: 研究特定形式的双曲型偏微分方程的分类问题，这类方程在数学物理中有重要应用。通过对称性分析来分类方程，这是可积系统和数学物理中的经典方法。
AI.method: 研究形式为 ∂²u/∂x∂y = F(∂u/∂x, ∂u/∂y, u) 的双曲型方程。分类标准是要求方程存在五阶及以上的高阶对称性，通过对称性分析来确定满足条件的方程形式。
AI.result: 通过对称性分析，得到了四个满足存在五阶及以上对称性条件的双曲型方程，完成了对该类方程的分类。
AI.conclusion: 成功对特定形式的双曲型方程进行了分类，基于高阶对称性要求找到了四个符合条件的方程，为这类方程的可积性研究提供了基础。

title: Directional Spectral Analysis: Dimension Reduction for Periodic Elliptic Operators
summary:
The study of the limiting absorption principle for elliptic equations with periodic structures is very challenging when the dimension is greater than 1. The fundamental reason for the dimensional barrier is the mismatch between directional physical reality and the direction-independent classic spectral analysis. In this paper, we introduce a new approach which introduce the direction into classic spectral analysis. With the new approach, the solution obtained by the limiting absorption principle can be formulated in a semi-analytic form, which not only gives an explicit representation of the solutions, but also reflects the phenomenon in physics.
  The new approach resolves the mismatch between mathematics and physics, and also breaks the dimensional barriers. It also opens a door to a lot of further possibilities, ranging from the analysis of solutions and numerical simulations for the solutions.

AI.tldr: 提出一种新方法，将方向引入经典谱分析，解决了高维周期结构中椭圆方程极限吸收原理的维度障碍问题。
AI.motivation: 研究高维（大于1维）周期结构中椭圆方程的极限吸收原理面临挑战，主要原因是方向性物理现实与方向无关的经典谱分析之间存在不匹配。
AI.method: 引入新方法，将方向因素融入经典谱分析中，使通过极限吸收原理获得的解能够以半解析形式表达。
AI.result: 新方法不仅提供了解的显式表示，还反映了物理现象，解决了数学与物理之间的不匹配问题，突破了维度障碍。
AI.conclusion: 该方法为解决高维周期结构问题开辟了新途径，为解的分析和数值模拟提供了新的可能性。

title: On the variational dual formulation of the Nash system and an adaptive convex gradient-flow approach to nonlinear PDEs
summary: We investigate the influence of base states on the consistency of the dual variational formulation for quadratic systems of PDEs, which are not necessarily conservative (typical examples include the noise-free Nash system with a quadratic Hamiltonian and multiple players). We identify a sufficient condition under which consistency holds over large time intervals. In particular, in the single-player case, there exists a sequence of base states (each exhibiting full consistency) that converges in mean to zero. We also prove existence of variational dual solutions to the noise-free Nash system for arbitrary base states. Furthermore, we propose a scheme based on Hilbertian gradient flows that, starting from an arbitrary base state, generates a sequence of new base states that is expected to converge to a solution of the original PDE.

AI.tldr: 研究二次PDE系统的对偶变分公式中基态对一致性的影响，针对非保守系统（如无噪声Nash系统），建立了保证大时间区间一致性的充分条件，并提出了基于希尔伯特梯度流的求解方案。
AI.motivation: 研究二次偏微分方程系统的对偶变分公式中基态选择对解一致性的影响，特别是针对非保守系统（如多玩家无噪声Nash系统），这类系统的对偶变分公式通常依赖于基态选择，需要理解何时能保证解的一致性。
AI.method: 1. 识别保证对偶变分公式在大时间区间内保持一致的充分条件；2. 在单玩家情况下构造收敛到零的基态序列；3. 证明任意基态下无噪声Nash系统对偶变分解的存在性；4. 提出基于希尔伯特梯度流的数值方案，从任意基态出发生成收敛到原PDE解的基态序列。
AI.result: 1. 建立了保证二次PDE系统对偶变分公式一致性的充分条件；2. 在单玩家情况下证明了存在收敛到零的完全一致基态序列；3. 证明了任意基态下无噪声Nash系统对偶变分解的存在性；4. 提出了有效的数值求解方案。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为二次PDE系统（特别是非保守系统如Nash系统）的对偶变分方法提供了理论基础和数值工具，明确了基态选择对解一致性的影响条件，并给出了有效的求解策略。

title: Conservation laws of nonlinear PDEs arising in elasticity and acoustics in Cartesian, cylindrical, and spherical geometries
comment: Submitted to Open Communications in Nonlinear Mathematical Physics. Special Issue in Honor of George W. Bluman, 2025 (27 pages, 6 tables)
summary: Conservation laws are computed for various nonlinear partial differential equations that arise in elasticity and acoustics. Using a scaling homogeneity approach, conservation laws are established for two models describing shear wave propagation in a circular cylinder and a cylindrical annulus. Next, using the multiplier method, conservation laws are derived for a parameterized system of constitutive equations in cylindrical coordinates involving a general expression for the Cauchy stress. Conservation laws for the Khokhlov-Zabolotskaya-Kuznetsov equation and Westervelt-type equations in various coordinate systems are also presented.

AI.tldr: 该论文计算了弹性力学和声学中非线性偏微分方程的守恒律，包括圆柱和圆柱环中的剪切波传播模型、参数化本构方程系统、以及Khokhlov-Zabolotskaya-Kuznetsov方程和Westervelt型方程在不同坐标系中的守恒律。
AI.motivation: 研究弹性力学和声学中非线性偏微分方程的守恒律，这些方程描述了波传播现象，守恒律的建立有助于理解物理系统的能量、动量等守恒性质，并为数值方法和解析分析提供基础。
AI.method: 采用两种主要方法：1）尺度齐次性方法用于圆柱和圆柱环中的剪切波传播模型；2）乘子法用于参数化本构方程系统。同时在不同坐标系中推导了Khokhlov-Zabolotskaya-Kuznetsov方程和Westervelt型方程的守恒律。
AI.result: 成功建立了多种非线性偏微分方程的守恒律，包括：1）圆柱和圆柱环剪切波传播模型的守恒律；2）圆柱坐标系中参数化本构方程系统的守恒律；3）Khokhlov-Zabolotskaya-Kuznetsov方程和Westervelt型方程在不同坐标系中的守恒律。
AI.conclusion: 该研究系统地推导了弹性力学和声学中多个重要非线性偏微分方程的守恒律，为这些物理系统的理论分析和数值模拟提供了重要工具，展示了不同数学方法在守恒律推导中的有效性。

title: Stability analysis for a plate-membrane system without geometric condition
summary: In this work, we consider a transmission problem describing a thermoelastic plate surrounding a membrane without any mechanical damping. The main results consist of the lack of exponential stability for this problem and the polynomial stability without the usual geometric condition.

AI.tldr: 研究无机械阻尼的膜包围热弹性板的传输问题，证明系统缺乏指数稳定性但具有多项式稳定性，且无需通常的几何条件
AI.motivation: 研究无机械阻尼的热弹性板-膜耦合系统的稳定性特性，特别是探索在没有通常几何条件限制下的稳定性行为
AI.method: 分析传输问题，建立数学模型描述热弹性板包围膜的系统，研究其稳定性特性
AI.result: 证明该系统缺乏指数稳定性，但具有多项式稳定性，且这一结果不需要通常的几何条件
AI.conclusion: 无机械阻尼的热弹性板-膜耦合系统虽然不能达到指数稳定，但可以实现多项式稳定，且这一稳定性不依赖于特定的几何条件

title: Almost sure global nonlinear smoothing for the 2D NLS
summary:
In this article, we prove an almost-sure global in time nonlinear smoothing effect for NLS on the two-dimensional torus. For deterministic data, this phenomenon was proved for the NLS on the circle by Erdoğan--Tzirakis, which remains unknown on multidimensional torus.
  Our argument is based on a quantitative quasi-invariance of Gaussian measures with covariance operator $(1-Δ)^{-s}$ for $s>2$.

AI.tldr: 证明了二维环面上NLS的几乎必然全局非线性平滑效应，这是确定性数据情况下多维环面上的首次结果
AI.motivation: 研究非线性薛定谔方程(NLS)在多维环面上的非线性平滑效应，填补了Erdoğan-Tzirakis在圆上证明结果后多维情况的空白
AI.method: 基于协方差算子为$(1-Δ)^{-s}$（$s>2$）的高斯测度的定量拟不变性论证
AI.result: 证明了二维环面上NLS的几乎必然全局非线性平滑效应，这是多维环面上的首次结果
AI.conclusion: 通过高斯测度的拟不变性方法，成功将一维圆上的非线性平滑效应推广到二维环面，为多维情况提供了新的理论工具

title: Convection Effects and Optimal Insulation: Modelling and Analysis
summary:
In this paper, we study an insulation problem that seeks to determine the optimal distribution of a given amount $m>0$ of insulating material coating an insulated boundary part $Γ_I\subseteq \partialΩ$ of a thermally conducting body $Ω\subseteq \mathbb{R}^d$, $d\in \mathbb{N}$, subject to convective heat transfer. The `$\textit{thickness}$' of the insulating layer $Σ_{I}^{\varepsilon}\subseteq \mathbb{R}^d$ is given locally via $\varepsilon \mathtt{d}$, where $\varepsilon>0$ denotes the (arbitrarily small) conductivity and $\mathtt{d}\colon Γ_{I}\to [0,+\infty)$ the (to be determined) distribution of the insulating material. Then, the physical process is modelled by the stationary heat equation in the insulated thermally conducting body $Ω_{I}^{\varepsilon}:= Ω\cupΣ_{I}^{\varepsilon}$ with Robin-type boundary conditions on the interacting insulation boundary $Γ_I^{\varepsilon}\subseteq \partialΩ_{I}^{\varepsilon}$ (reflecting convective heat transfer between the thermally conducting body $Ω$ and its surrounding medium) as well as Dirichlet and Neumann boundary conditions at the remaining boundary parts, $\textit{i.e.}$, $\partialΩ_{I}^{\varepsilon}\setminus Γ_I^{\varepsilon}$.
  More precisely, we establish $Γ(L^2(\mathbb{R}^d))$-convergence of the heat loss formulation (as ${\varepsilon \to 0^+}$), in the case that the thermally conducting body $Ω$ is a bounded Lipschitz domain having a $C^{1,1}$-regular or piece-wise flat insulated boundary $Γ_I$.

AI.tldr: 研究绝缘材料在热传导体边界上的最优分布问题，通过Γ-收敛方法分析热损失最小化
AI.motivation: 研究如何将给定数量的绝缘材料最优分布在热传导体的边界上，以最小化热损失，考虑对流热传递的物理过程
AI.method: 建立绝缘层的数学模型，厚度由εd表示，其中ε为小参数，d为材料分布函数。通过Γ-收敛方法分析当ε→0+时热损失泛函的收敛性
AI.result: 证明了在Ω是有界Lipschitz域且Γ_I具有C^{1,1}正则性或分段平坦的情况下，热损失泛函的Γ(L^2(ℝ^d))-收敛性
AI.conclusion: 该研究为绝缘材料最优分布问题提供了严格的数学分析框架，通过Γ-收敛方法建立了热损失最小化问题的收敛理论

title: Quasi invariant Gaussian measures for the nonlinear Schrödinger equation on $\mathbb T^2$
summary: We study the transport of Gaussian measures under the flow of the 2-dimensional defocusing Schrödinger equation $i \partial_t u + Δu = |u|^{2k} u$ posed on $\mathbb T^2$. In particular, we show that the Gaussian measures with inverse covariance $\|u\|_{H^s}^2$, are quasi-invariant under the flow for $s>2$. Moreover, we show that the Radon-Nykodim density belongs to every $L^p$ space, locally in space. The proof relies on the physical-space energies introduced in [52], as well as a new abstract quasi-invariance argument that allows us to combine space-time estimates, along the flow with probabilistic bounds on the support of the measure.

AI.tldr: 研究二维散焦薛定谔方程流下高斯测度的输运，证明对于s>2的逆协方差高斯测度具有准不变性，且Radon-Nikodym密度局部属于所有L^p空间
AI.motivation: 研究非线性薛定谔方程流下高斯测度的动力学行为，特别是测度在方程流作用下的准不变性，这对于理解随机偏微分方程的统计性质具有重要意义
AI.method: 结合物理空间能量方法和新的抽象准不变性论证，将时空估计与测度支撑上的概率界相结合
AI.result: 证明了对于s>2的高斯测度在二维散焦薛定谔方程流下具有准不变性，且Radon-Nikodym密度局部属于所有L^p空间
AI.conclusion: 该研究为非线性薛定谔方程随机分析提供了重要工具，展示了高斯测度在非线性流下的良好性质，为后续随机偏微分方程研究奠定了基础

title: PFEM-GP-dpHs : a finite element framework for combining Gaussian processes and infinite-dimensional port-Hamiltonian systems
summary: In order to learn distributed port-Hamiltonian systems (dpHs) using Gaussian processes (GPs), the partitioned finite element method (PFEM) is combined with the Gp-dpHs method. By following a late lumping approach, the discretization of the functional hyperparameters of the GP prior over the Hamiltonian functional is chosen independently from the discretization of the dpHs, thus reducing the numerical complexity of our method. We next model the mean of the GP prior of the Hamiltonian as a quadratic form, enabling the GP kernel to focus on the nonlinear part of a given dpHs. We illustrate our method on a nonlinear one dimensional wave equation with unknown physical parameters (tension and linear mass).

AI.tldr: 结合PFEM与GP-dpHs方法学习分布式端口哈密顿系统，采用后集总方法降低数值复杂度，将哈密顿函数均值建模为二次形式以聚焦非线性部分
AI.motivation: 学习分布式端口哈密顿系统（dpHs）的挑战在于处理无限维系统，需要开发能够有效处理非线性且降低数值复杂度的方法
AI.method: 结合分区有限元法（PFEM）与GP-dpHs方法，采用后集总方法独立离散化哈密顿泛函的超参数，将GP先验均值建模为二次形式
AI.result: 方法成功应用于具有未知物理参数（张力和线性质量）的非线性一维波动方程，验证了方法的有效性
AI.conclusion: 提出的方法能够有效学习分布式端口哈密顿系统，通过后集总方法降低数值复杂度，二次形式均值建模使GP核能专注于系统的非线性部分

title: Rigidity of weighted manifolds via classification results for semilinear equations
summary:
We study model semilinear equations on complete and non-compact weighted Riemannian manifolds with non-negative Bakry-Émery Ricci curvature. Our main goal is to classify positive solutions of the equation at the Sobolev-critical exponent, and furthermore to prove that the existence of such solutions implies rigidity of the manifold and triviality of the weight.
  This is possible when the weighted manifold has non-negative finite dimensional Bakry-Émery Ricci curvature, and even under the weaker condition of non-negative infinite dimensional Bakry-Émery Ricci curvature, up to imposing some additional conditions in the latter case. To exhibit the sharpness of these additional conditions, we construct a non-trivial positive solution of the critical problem on a weighted manifold with positive infinite dimensional curvature.
  We also obtain a corresponding rigidity result for solutions of the Liouville equation on weighted Riemannian surfaces. Finally, we prove some non-existence theorems when the nonlinearity is sub-critical or simply under certain volume growth conditions. In particular, the latter rules out all positive solutions on shrinking gradient Ricci solitons.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究加权黎曼流形上Sobolev临界指数半线性方程的正解分类，证明正解存在会导致流形刚性和权函数平凡化，并构造反例展示条件的尖锐性。
AI.motivation: 研究非紧加权黎曼流形上Sobolev临界指数半线性方程的正解分类问题，探索正解存在性与流形几何结构（特别是Bakry-Émery Ricci曲率）之间的深刻联系。
AI.method: 在具有非负Bakry-Émery Ricci曲率的加权黎曼流形上，分析Sobolev临界指数方程的正解。考虑有限维和无限维曲率条件，在无限维情况下施加额外条件，并构造反例验证条件的尖锐性。
AI.result: 1. 在非负有限维Bakry-Émery Ricci曲率条件下，正解存在导致流形刚性和权函数平凡化；2. 在无限维曲率条件下，附加条件后得到类似结果；3. 构造了正无限维曲率流形上的非平凡正解，证明附加条件的必要性；4. 获得加权黎曼曲面Liouville方程的刚性结果；5. 证明亚临界非线性或特定体积增长条件下的非存在性定理。
AI.conclusion: Sobolev临界指数方程正解的存在性与加权流形的几何结构密切相关，正解存在通常意味着流形具有刚性结构且权函数平凡。研究揭示了Bakry-Émery Ricci曲率条件在决定解存在性中的关键作用，特别是在无限维曲率情况下需要附加条件。

title: An abstract framework for a class of nonlocal structured population models: existence, uniqueness and stability of steady states
summary: This paper is concerned with the study of a class of nonlinear nonlocal functional evolution problems defined in an abstract Banach algebra. We introduce an abstract functional setting that encompasses a wide range of structured population models appearing in biomathematical literature. Within this framework, we analyze the well-posedness of the Cauchy problem and the existence of stationary solutions in the positive cone of the Banach algebra. By reviewing a large number of approaches, we also derive conditions for the local and global stability of these stationary solutions. Additionally, we explore the limits of these conditions by exhibiting explicit counterexamples. In particular, for mutation--selection models with symmetric mutation operators, we uncover both sufficient conditions for existence, uniqueness and stability, and counterexamples to existence or stability.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究抽象Banach代数中的非线性非局部泛函演化问题，为生物数学中的结构化种群模型提供统一分析框架，探讨解的存在性、唯一性、稳定性及反例。
AI.motivation: 为生物数学文献中广泛出现的结构化种群模型建立统一的抽象泛函分析框架，系统研究这类非线性非局部演化问题的数学性质。
AI.method: 在抽象Banach代数中引入泛函分析框架，分析柯西问题的适定性，研究正锥中稳态解的存在性，通过综述多种方法推导局部和全局稳定性条件，并构造显式反例检验条件极限。
AI.result: 建立了结构化种群模型的统一分析框架，获得了适定性、稳态解存在性、稳定性条件等理论结果，特别针对对称突变算子的突变-选择模型，给出了存在性、唯一性、稳定性的充分条件及存在性或稳定性的反例。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为生物数学中的结构化种群模型提供了系统的数学分析工具，揭示了这类非线性非局部演化问题的基本数学性质，特别在突变-选择模型中明确了理论条件的边界。

title: The principal eigenvalue of an age-structured operator with diffusion and advection: qualitative analysis and an application
summary: In this paper, we investigate an eigenvalue problem associated with an age-structured operator incorporating random diffusion and advection. Our primary focus is on examining the asymptotic behaviors of the principal eigenvalue with respect to large advection and small or large diffusion rates. We subsequently apply these results to a nonlinear age-structured model, providing a better understanding of how diffusion and advection influence the spatial distribution of species. Among other ingredients, our approach involves constructing various types of super- and sub-solutions to tackle the novel challenges posed by the nonlocal terms in the problems under consideration.

AI.tldr: 研究年龄结构算子的特征值问题，分析主特征值在大平流和小/大扩散率下的渐近行为，并应用于非线性年龄结构模型以理解扩散和平流对物种空间分布的影响。
AI.motivation: 研究年龄结构算子结合随机扩散和平流的特征值问题，旨在理解扩散和平流如何影响物种的空间分布，特别是通过分析主特征值的渐近行为来揭示这些因素对种群动态的影响。
AI.method: 构建各种类型的上解和下解来处理问题中的非局部项带来的新挑战，分析主特征值在大平流和小/大扩散率下的渐近行为。
AI.result: 获得了主特征值在大平流和小/大扩散率下的渐近行为结果，并将这些结果应用于非线性年龄结构模型，更好地理解了扩散和平流对物种空间分布的影响。
AI.conclusion: 通过分析年龄结构算子的特征值问题，揭示了扩散和平流对物种空间分布的重要影响，为理解种群动态提供了新的理论工具和见解。

title: A non-local quenching system with coupled and uncoupled singular absorption terms
summary: In this paper we study a non-local diffusion system of two equations with both coupled and uncoupled singular absorption terms of the type $u^{-p}$. We prove that there exist necessary and sufficient conditions for the existence of both stationary and quenching solutions. We also characterize in terms of the exponents of the absorption terms when the quenching is simultaneous or non-simultaneous and obtain the quenching rates.

AI.tldr: 研究具有奇异性吸收项的非局部扩散系统，证明稳态解和熄灭解的存在条件，分析熄灭的同步性及其速率
AI.motivation: 研究具有耦合和非耦合奇异性吸收项的非局部扩散系统，这类系统在数学物理中具有重要意义，特别是对于理解具有奇异非线性项的扩散过程
AI.method: 采用数学分析方法，建立存在性定理，分析解的熄灭行为，通过指数参数刻画熄灭的同步性，并推导熄灭速率
AI.result: 证明了稳态解和熄灭解存在的充分必要条件，根据吸收项的指数特征化了熄灭的同步性（同时或非同时），并获得了熄灭速率
AI.conclusion: 该研究为具有奇异性吸收项的非局部扩散系统提供了完整的数学理论框架，揭示了吸收项指数对解行为的关键影响

title: Generic regularity and Lipschitz metric for a two-component Novikov system
summary: We investigate the Cauchy problem for a two-component generalization of the Novikov equation with cubic nonlinearity -- an integrable system whose solutions may develop strong nonlinear phenomena such as gradient blow-up and interactions between peakon-like structures. Our study has two main objectives: first, to analyze the generic regularity of global conservative solutions; and second, to construct a new metric that guarantees the Lipschitz continuity of the flow. Building on the geometric framework developed by Bressan and Chen for quasilinear second-order wave equations, we prove that the solution retains $C^k$ regularity away from a finite number of piecewise $C^{k-1}$ characteristic curves. Furthermore, we provide a description of the solution behavior in the vicinity of these curves. By introducing a Finsler norm on tangent vectors in the space of solutions, expressed in the transformed Bressan-Constantin variables, we introduce a Lipschitz metric representing the minimal energy transportation cost between two solutions.

AI.tldr: 本文研究具有三次非线性的Novikov方程两分量推广的柯西问题，分析全局保守解的通用正则性，并构造保证流Lipschitz连续性的新度量。
AI.motivation: 该系统的解可能出现梯度爆破和peakon结构相互作用等强非线性现象，需要研究全局保守解的正则性特征，并建立保证解流Lipschitz连续性的度量，以更好地理解这类可积系统的动力学行为。
AI.method: 基于Bressan和Chen为拟线性二阶波动方程发展的几何框架，证明解在有限条分段C^{k-1}特征曲线外保持C^k正则性。引入Finsler范数于解空间切向量上（用变换后的Bressan-Constantin变量表示），构造表示两个解间最小能量输运成本的Lipschitz度量。
AI.result: 证明了全局保守解在有限条分段C^{k-1}特征曲线外保持C^k正则性，并描述了这些曲线附近的解行为。成功构造了保证解流Lipschitz连续性的新度量。
AI.conclusion: 本文为具有三次非线性的Novikov方程两分量推广建立了完整的正则性理论和Lipschitz度量框架，为研究这类可积系统的强非线性现象提供了重要工具。

title: Fractional and Integer Order Sobolev Spaces for Compact Metric Graphs
summary: Given a compact metric graph $Γ$ and the Laplacian $Δ_Γ$ coupled with standard (Kirchhoff) vertex conditions, solutions to fractional elliptic partial differential equations of the form $(κ^2 - Δ_Γ)^{α/2}u=f$ on $Γ$ exhibit a distinctive regularity structure: even-order derivatives are continuous across vertices, while odd-order derivatives may be discontinuous. This non-standard smoothness property precludes the direct application of classical tools from real functional analysis. Because of this, we introduce and systematically study new families of Sobolev spaces tailored to this setting. We define these spaces, denoted $W^{α,p}(Γ)$ and $H^α(Γ)$, to respect the continuity constraints on even-order derivatives at vertices, while permitting discontinuities in odd-order derivatives. We establish their fundamental properties, including characterizations, embedding theorems into Hölder and Lebesgue spaces, and compactness results. A central contribution in this investigation is the derivation of uniform bounds on the supremum norm of eigenfunctions for a class of Laplacians on metric graphs, a result of independent interest. Finally, we demonstrate that these spaces provide a natural framework for analyzing the regularity of solutions to fractional elliptic PDEs and SPDEs driven by Gaussian white noise on metric graphs, in particular, establishing a general characterization of the domain of the fractional powers of $(κ^2-Δ_Γ)$ and $(κ^2-\nabla(a\nabla))$ in terms of the Sobolev spaces we introduce, thereby extending all previously known characterizations in the literature, and improving the regularity results previously obtained to their sharp counterparts (with general fractional powers). We also show that these spaces are fundamental to the characterization of Gaussian free fields on metric graphs.

AI.tldr: 论文研究了度量图上分数阶椭圆PDE解的奇异性结构，构建了适应这种结构的Sobolev空间，并应用于分数阶椭圆方程和SPDE的适定性分析。
AI.motivation: 度量图上分数阶Laplacian方程的解具有特殊的正则性结构：偶数阶导数在顶点连续，奇数阶导数可能不连续。这种非标准光滑性使得经典实泛函分析工具无法直接应用，需要构建新的函数空间框架。
AI.method: 引入并系统研究新的Sobolev空间族W^{α,p}(Γ)和H^α(Γ)，这些空间尊重顶点处偶数阶导数的连续性约束，同时允许奇数阶导数的不连续性。建立这些空间的基本性质，包括刻画、嵌入定理和紧致性结果。
AI.result: 1. 建立了度量图上Laplacian特征函数的一致上界估计；2. 给出了分数阶算子(κ²-Δ_Γ)^{α/2}和(κ²-∇(a∇))^{α/2}定义域的一般刻画；3. 将已有文献中的所有刻画推广到一般分数幂情形，并得到尖锐的正则性结果；4. 证明了这些空间对刻画度量图上的高斯自由场是基本的。
AI.conclusion: 所构建的Sobolev空间为分析度量图上分数阶椭圆PDE和SPDE的解提供了自然框架，解决了经典工具无法处理奇数阶导数不连续性的问题，并得到了最优的正则性结果。

title: Estimating parameters of the diffusion model via asymptotic expansions
summary: A broad class of inverse problems deals with determining certain parameters, from measurement data, in models which are associated to certain partial differential equations. In this work we focus on the heat equation on a finite interval and we determine the dimensionless diffusion parameter from a single measurement. Our results extend to estimating additional parameters of the initial-boundary value problem, such as the length of the interval and/or the time required for the solution to achieve a specific state. Our approach relies on the asymptotic solution of an integral equation: The formulation of this integral equation is based on the solution of the direct problem via the Fokas method; the solution of this equation is achieved through the asymptotic evaluation of the associated integrals which yield an effective approximate solution, supported by numerical verifications. We apply these approximations to well-established problems in soil science and we compare our results with existing ones, displaying clear improvement.

AI.tldr: 基于热方程反问题，通过Fokas方法构建积分方程，利用渐近分析从单次测量估计扩散参数及其他参数，在土壤科学应用中表现优于现有方法
AI.motivation: 解决偏微分方程反问题中从测量数据确定参数的问题，特别是热方程在有限区间上的扩散参数估计，扩展至区间长度和达到特定状态所需时间等参数
AI.method: 使用Fokas方法求解正问题构建积分方程，通过渐近分析评估相关积分得到近似解，数值验证支持该方法
AI.result: 方法在土壤科学经典问题中应用，与现有方法相比显示出明显改进
AI.conclusion: 提出的渐近方法能有效从单次测量估计热方程反问题的多个参数，在应用中优于传统方法

title: Growth estimates for axisymmetric Euler equations without swirl
summary: We consider the axisymmetric Euler equations in $\mathbb{R}^3$ without swirl, and establish several upper and lower bounds for the growth of solutions. On the one hand, we obtain an upper bound $t^2$ for the radial moment $\int_{\mathbb{R}^3} rω^θdx$, which is the conjectured optimal rate by Childress (Phys. D 237(14-17):1921-1925, 2008). On the other hand, for all initial data satisfying certain symmetry and sign conditions, we prove that the radial moment grows at least like $t/\log t$ as time goes to infinity, and $\|ω(\cdot,t)\|_{L^p(\mathbb{R}^3)}$ exhibits at least $t^{1/4}$ growth in the limsup sense for all $1\leq p\leq \infty$. To the best of our knowledge, this is the first result to establish power-law $L^p$-norm growth for smooth, compactly supported initial vorticity in $\mathbb{R}^3$. For these initial data, we also show that nearly all vorticity must eventually escape to $r\to\infty$ in the time-integral sense.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了无旋轴对称欧拉方程，建立了解的增长率上下界：径向矩上界为t²（最优速率），下界为t/log t；Lp范数下界为t^{1/4}增长；并证明涡量最终会逃逸到无穷远。
AI.motivation: 研究三维无旋轴对称欧拉方程解的长时间行为，特别是涡量的增长率。Childress曾推测径向矩的最优增长率为t²，本文旨在验证这一猜想并建立更精确的增长率估计。
AI.method: 对满足特定对称性和符号条件的初始数据，采用分析技术建立径向矩的上下界估计。通过构造合适的泛函和利用方程的特殊结构，证明Lp范数的幂律增长行为。
AI.result: 1. 径向矩上界为t²，验证了Childress的最优速率猜想；2. 径向矩下界为t/log t；3. Lp范数(1≤p≤∞)在limsup意义下至少以t^{1/4}增长；4. 涡量在时间积分意义下最终逃逸到无穷远。
AI.conclusion: 本文首次证明了三维光滑紧支初始涡量的Lp范数幂律增长，建立了径向矩的精确增长率上下界，揭示了轴对称欧拉方程解的长时间渐近行为特征。

title: Evolution equation with fractional Schrödinger operators: monotonicity and exponential decay of solutions in Morrey spaces
summary: We consider evolution equation with fractional Schrödinger operators in Morrey spaces. We prove order preserving properties of the associated semigroup in Morrey scale. We prove monotonicity of the semigroup with respect to Morrey's potentials and give some precise estimates of its exponential growth. We show that Arendt and Batty's type condition on the potential is necessary for exponential decay of Morrey's norms of the semigroup and find a large class of dissipative potentials for which it is also sufficient.

AI.tldr: 在Morrey空间中研究分数阶薛定谔算子的演化方程，证明半群在Morrey尺度下的保序性、关于Morrey势的单调性，给出指数增长估计，并建立Arendt-Batty型条件与指数衰减的关系
AI.motivation: 研究分数阶薛定谔算子在Morrey空间中的演化方程性质，特别是半群的保序性、单调性和指数增长/衰减行为，扩展经典薛定谔算子理论到更一般的函数空间
AI.method: 在Morrey空间中分析分数阶薛定谔算子相关的演化方程，使用半群理论方法，研究半群在Morrey尺度下的性质，包括保序性、关于势的单调性，并建立指数增长估计和衰减条件
AI.result: 证明了半群在Morrey尺度下的保序性质；建立了半群关于Morrey势的单调性；给出了半群指数增长的精确估计；证明了Arendt-Batty型条件对Morrey范数指数衰减的必要性；找到了一大类耗散势使该条件也成为充分条件
AI.conclusion: 分数阶薛定谔算子在Morrey空间中的演化方程具有丰富的结构性质，包括保序性、单调性和指数行为，Arendt-Batty型条件在Morrey框架下对指数衰减起着关键作用

title: Well-posedness of multidimensional nonlocal conservation laws with nonlinear mobility and bounded force
summary: We establish local-in-time existence and uniqueness results for nonlocal conservation laws with a nonlinear mobility, in several space dimensions, under weak assumptions on the kernel, which is assumed to be bounded and of finite total variation. Contrary to the linear mobility case, solutions may develop shocks in finite time, even when the kernel is smooth. We construct entropy solutions via a vanishing viscosity method, and provide a rate of convergence for this approximation scheme.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了具有非线性迁移率的非局部守恒律的局部时间存在性和唯一性，证明了即使核光滑，解也可能在有限时间内产生激波，并通过粘性消失法构造了熵解。

title: Exponential Absolute Minimizing extension and biased infinity Laplacian
summary:
We study the variational structure of the biased infinity Laplacian by introducing a notion of the $β$\textit{-Exponential Absolute Minimizing Extension} ($β$--AM) on arbitrary length space, which absolutely minimizing the exponential slope
  $$ L^β_u (E) := β\sup_{x,y \in E} \frac{u(y) - e^{-β|x-y|} u(x)}{1- e^{-β|x-y|}}. $$We also define the corresponding Exponential McShane-Whitney-type extension, and $β$-biased convexity, which equivalently characterize $β$-AM and may be of independent interest. These generalize the classical Absolute Minimizing Lipschitz Extension as a special case when $β= 0$. In Euclidean space with Euclidean norm, this corresponds to the Aronsson equation with Hamiltonian \[ H(u, \nabla u) = |\nabla u| + βu, \] equivalently viscosity solutions of $Δ_{\infty}^β u = 0$. We show that $β$-AM arises as the continuum value of a biased tug-of-war game. Analogous to the unbiased case, we derive various properties of this extension. As an application, we further show that the linear blow-up property holds for biased infinity harmonic functions.
